login_description: Log into your account to continue to the football game, manage your team, and adjust your account settings. If you don't have an account, register quickly and easily!
register_description: Register quickly and easily to join our football simulator. Create an account, choose your team, and start competing with other players. Welcome to the community of football fans!
validation_first_name: Please enter a valid first name (at least 2 characters).
validation_last_name: Please enter a valid last name (at least 2 characters).
validation_username: Please enter a valid username (at least 3 characters).
validation_team_name: Please enter a valid team name.
validation_email: Please enter a valid email address.
validation_password: An error occurred during registration. Please try again.
validation_password_confirm: An error occurred during registration. Please try again.
register_failed: An error occurred during registration. Please try again.
email_exists: Email already exists. Please use a different one.
